downloadTitle: Improving the Reach and Manageability of Microsoft Access 2010 Database Applications with Microsoft Access Services
downloadDescription: Improve the Reach and Manageability of Microsoft Access 2010 Database Applications with Microsoft Access Services

downloadFile.name: Access 2010-Improving the Reach and Manageability of your Database Applications.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/2/1/7/2179b3a8-2c4d-4697-b2c3-fd98d433f358/Access 2010-Improving the Reach and Manageability of your Database Applications.docx

detailsSection: Access Services is a new feature of Microsoft® SharePoint Server 2010 Enterprise Edition that supports close integration with Microsoft® Access 2010. This integration enables users to extend the ease of Access application development to the creation of Web forms and reports, and it enables IT managers to extend the ease of SharePoint 2010 Products administration to the management of Access data, application objects, and application behavior. This paper explains the benefits and architecture of this new level of integration, and it provides technical details that will be helpful in implementing successful migration of existing Access applications to this new architecture.
detailsSection_file_name: Access 2010-Improving the Reach and Manageability of your Database Applications.docx
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this paper, you must have Microsoft Office Word 2007. You can also use Office Word 2003 or Word XP and the Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
